ABOUT_P1: LotteryTracker is an innovative new web service to manage the administrative functions of your group lotteries and capture information centrally for all group members.
ABOUT_H1_2: view images of all lottery tickets purchased for your group
ABOUT_H1_3: review past results for tickets purchased
ABOUT_H1_4: view a running total of lottery winnings
ABOUT_H2_1: Increase the proficiency of your group lotteries by using LotteryTracker to:
ABOUT_H2_4: retain historical information on lottery draws
ABOUT_H2_5: provide timely updates on the progress of your group lottery
ABOUT_H2_6: foster trust in group lottery pools
ABOUT_H3_2: LotteryTracker is free for you to use. We ask that you send us your feedback on how the site is working and provide suggestions on how we can further improve the site.

ALERTS_DESCRIPTION: Get notified if jackpots reach a certain amount. Use the slider to select a minimum jackpot amount. When the jackpot is equal to or greater than the amount, we will email you.
REGISTER_ERROR_FIRSTNAME: First Name must be at least 3 characters.
REGISTER_ERROR_LASTNAME: Last Name must be at least 3 characters.
REGISTER_ERROR_EMAILADDRESS: Email Address must be at least 6 characters.
REGISTER_ERROR_PASSWORD: Password must be at least 6 characters.
REGISTER_CONFIRM_DESC: An email was sent to your address.  Within 24 hours, click on the link in your email to activate your account.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_DESC: Enter your email to retrieve your password.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_SUBMITTED: Your request was submitted.  Please check your email and follow the instructions.
CHANGE_PASSWORD_DESC: Enter current and new password.  Your new password must be 6 to 16 characters.
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
LOGIN_EMPTY_PARAMS: You must specify a valid email address and password to sign in.
LOGIN_INCORRECT: The email address or password entered is incorrect.  Please try again.
SESSION_EXPIRED: Your session has expired.  Please login.
SELECT_GROUP: Swipe to view or manage your group
GROUP_ERROR_SAVING: There was an error saving.  Try again later
GROUP_EDIT_DESC: Edit the name of your group and click Save
GROUP_NO_GROUPS: We noticed you don't have any groups
GROUP_CREATE_NEW_GROUP: Click here to create a new group
GROUP_NEW_DESC: Create your own group by giving it a name
GROUP_EDIT_DEL_DESC: Deleting your group is permanent and not recoverable.  If you delete this group, all members will be removed and tickets will be deleted.
GROUP_SELECT_GROUP: Select a group to begin creating your ticket
DASHBOARD_ADD_COMMENT: Write a message to your group
DASHBOARD_SELECT_A_GROUP: Select a group before posting your comment
DASHBOARD_ERROR_POSTING_MESSAGE: There was an error posting your message. Try again later
DASHBOARD_NO_MESSAGES: No messages. Be the first to post a message to your group.
WINNING_NUMBERS_INSTRUCTIONS: Swipe draws left to see previous draws.
MEMBER_ADD_USER_TO_GROUP: Add a new member to the group
MEMBER_ROLE_UPDATE_ERROR: There was an error updating the member role
AUTHORIZATION_ERROR: You are not authorized to make this request
GENERIC_ERROR_LOADING: There was a processing error.  Please verify your internet connection and try again
ERROR_SERVER_NOT_REACHABLE: Failed to contact server.  Please verify your internet connection and try again
